documentation.text:
@dev Provides a set of functions to operate with Base64 strings.
 _Available since v4.5._

statements.documentation:
Inspired by Brecht Devos (Brechtpd) implementation - MIT licence
 https://github.com/Brechtpd/base64/blob/e78d9fd951e7b0977ddca77d92dc85183770daf4/base64.sol

documentation.text: @dev Converts a `bytes` to its Bytes64 `string` representation.

natspec.details: Provides a set of functions to operate with Base64 strings. _Available since v4.5._

opcodes: PUSH20 0x0 ADDRESS EQ PUSH1 0x80 PUSH1 0x40 MSTORE PUSH1 0x0 DUP1 REVERT INVALID LOG2 PUSH5 0x6970667358 0x22 SLT KECCAK256 0x29 0xC7 PUSH3 0x418BB6 0x28 SHR LOG3 NOT LOG1 COINBASE SWAP1 0x4F 0x5C 0xAD SMOD RETURN XOR 0xBB PUSH5 0xDA8FFCDC04 0xC9 CREATE2 SWAP2 0x4B 0xCA POP PUSH5 0x736F6C6343 STOP ADDMOD 0xC STOP CALLER
